characteristics.name: Powers Known
characteristics.value: Smite and two powers from the Dark Hereticus discipline

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: During deployment, you can set up this model in a teleportarium chamber instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases the model can use a teleport strike to arrive on the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: Smite has a warp charge value of 5. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds (pg 181). If the result of the Psychic test was more than 10 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a visible friendly DEATH GUARD unit within 18" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, add 1 to all wound rolls made by that unit in the Fight phase. Furthermore, any wound rolls of 7+ made for that unit in the Fight phase with a melee plague weapon (i.e. a plaguesword or any weapon with the Plague Weapon ability) inflict a mortal wound on the target in addition to any other damage.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all of this weapon's shots have been resolved.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Re-roll all failed wound rolls when resolving attacks made with a plague weapon (i.e. a plaguesword or any weapon with the Plague Weapon ability) for any friendly DEATH GUARD unit within 7" of your Warlord.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a visible friendly DEATH GUARD unit within 18" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, your opponent must subtract 1 from all hit rolls that target that unit.

meta.name: Chaos Cultist w/ autopistol and brutal assault weapon
Chaos Cultist w/ Brutal assault weapon

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Each time the bearer fights, it can make 1 additional attack with this weapon. This extra attack is included in its profile.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time an enemy INFANTRY model is slain by a Poxwalker in the Fight phase, add one model to the Poxwalker's unit.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: You can add 1 to all hit rolls for this unit in the Fight phase if it contains more than 10 models.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This unit never has to take Morale tests.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: You can re-roll all failed hit rolls in the Fight phase for friendly DEATH GUARD units that are within 7" of this model.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If your Army is Battle-forged, and you have any Tallymen on the battlefield, roll 2D6 each time you spend Command Points to use a Death Guard Stratagem. If the result is 7, Nurgle bestows his blessing upon your army; the Command Points spent to use that Stratagem are immediately refunded.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: The wearer of Fugaris' Helm increases the range of any aura abilities on its datasheet (such as Nurgle's Gift, Tocsin of Misery, etc.) by 3".

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a dice before removing it from the battlefield. On a 4+, its racks of blight grenades explode, and each unit within 7" suffers 1 mortal wound unless it has the NURGLE keyword.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Increase the Strength and Damage of all blight grenades carried by friendly DEATH GUARD units by 1 whilst they are within 3" of any Biologus Putrifiers. In addition, whilst a unit is within 3" of this model, each wound roll of 6+ made when attacking with a blight grenade inflicts a mortal wound in addition to any other damage.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Plague Weapon. This weapon's damage changes to 1 when attacking VEHICLES.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Plague Weapon. Each wound roll of 6+ made for this weapon inflicts a mortal wound in addition to any other damage.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A Plague Marine equipped with two plague knives, a plague knife and a bubotic axe, or a mace of contagion and bubotic axe, has an Attacks characteristic of 2 instead of 1.

characteristics.value: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: When attacking with this weapon, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll.

meta.name: Mace of Contagion and bubotic axe

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: When attacking with this weapon, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this weapon.

meta.name: Mace of Contagion and bubotic axe

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: When attacking with this weapon, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Plague Weapon. Make D3 hit rolls each time you attack with this weapon, instead of only one. Excess damage from this weapon is not lost; instead keep allocating damage to another model in the unit until either all the damage has been allocated or the target is destroyed.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Enemy units that are within 6" of any units with an Icon of Despair must subtract 1 from their Ld.

characteristics.name: Capacity
characteristics.value: This unit can transport 10 DEATH GUARD INFANTRY. It cannot, however, transport TERMINATORS.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Roll a D6 at the start of each of your turns; on a 6, this unit heals one wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing it from the battlefield and before any embarked models disembark. On a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per game, instead of shooting any weapons in the Shooting phase, the vehicle can use its Smoke Launchers; until your next Shooting phase your opponent must subtract 1 from all hit rolls for ranged weapons that target this vehicle.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all of this weapon's shots have been resolved.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Roll a dice each time a friendly DEATH GUARD CHARACTER is hit by a ranged or melee weapon attack whilst he is within 3" of this unit. On a 2+ one of the Deathshroud intercepts that hit - the character is not hit by that attack but this unit is instead.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: DEATH GUARD CHARACTERS (excluding Mortarion) within 3" of any friendly Deathshroud Terminator units add 1 to their Attacks characteristic.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Models in this unit have a 4+ invulnerable save, but you must halve the result of the dice rolled when determining how far this unit Advances.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: During deployment, you can set up this model in a teleportarium chamber instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases the model can use a teleport strike to arrive on the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Plague Weapon. This weapon automatically hits its target.

characteristics.value: Plague Weapon. This weapon automatically hits its target.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: You may re-roll any Disgustingly Resilient rolls of 1 made for friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY units within 3" of this model.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Add 1 to hit and wound rolls made for this model in the Fight phase when targeting an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES BIKER unit.

characteristics.value: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can only use this weapon once per battle. If it hits, roll one dice for each model in the enemy unit, re-rolling any results of 1 - that unit suffers a mortal wound for each roll of a 6.

characteristics.value: Smite and 2 powers from the Contagion discipline

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Friendly units of Poxwalkers increase their Strength and Toughness by 1 whilst they are within 7" of Typhus.

At the end of any of your Movement phases the model can use a teleport strike to arrive on the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Models in this unit have a 4+ invulnerable save, but you must halve the result of the dice rolled when determining how far this unit Advances.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: All DEATH GUARD units within 7" of a friendly LORD OF CONTAGION are surrounded by a deadly aura of plague and disease. Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of any affected friendly units at the start of your turn; on a 4+ that enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: This weapon hits on hit rolls of 5+ (even when firing Overwatch), regardless of any modifiers.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: Smite has a warp charge value of 5. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds (pg 181). If the result of the Psychic test was more than 10 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a visible friendly DEATH GUARD unit within 18" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, add 1 to all wound rolls made by that unit in the Fight phase. Furthermore, any wound rolls of 7+ made for that unit in the Fight phase with a melee plague weapon (i.e. a plaguesword or any weapon with the Plague Weapon ability) inflict a mortal wound on the target in addition to any other damage.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a visible firendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit within 18" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, add 1 to that unit's Strength and Toughness characteristics.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Enemy units must subtract 1 from any hit rolls that target this unit in the Fight phase.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY units that are entirely within 7" of a Mephitic Blight-hauler gain the benefit of cover when making armour saves.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This unit does not suffer the penalty for moving and firing Heavy weapons.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If a Myphitic Blight-hauler is reduced to 0 Wounds, roll a dice before removing it from the battlefield, on a 4+ it explodes, and each unit within 7" suffers 1 mortal wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: If the target is within half range of this weapon, roll two dice when inflicting damage with it and discard the lowest result.
